servers.description: API endpoint for IP address estimation

post.description: Applies multiple updateCells requests to a spreadsheet by ID.

get.description: Returns list of tabs (sub-sheets) in a spreadsheet.

post.summary: Add a new tab to spreadsheet
post.description: Creates a new sheet tab (CSV file) inside the spreadsheet folder.

400.description: Missing required parameters or tab already exists

delete.description: Deletes a sheet tab (CSV file) inside the spreadsheet folder.

post.summary: Apply formatting to a sheet tab
post.description: Stores formatting information for a specific tab in a spreadsheet.

post.summary: Create a filter on a sheet tab
post.description: Stores filter configurations for a specific tab in a spreadsheet.

post.summary: Freeze rows or columns in a sheet tab
post.description: Stores freezing configuration (rows/columns) for a specific sheet tab.

post.summary: Apply conditional formatting to sheet tab
post.description: Stores conditional formatting rule for a given sheet tab.
Executes a simple query on the spreadsheet (currently only supports SELECT *).
Apply formatting metadata to the document.
Inserts an image placeholder into the document content at a specified index.
